sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block
  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light
      &:hover
        background-color: transparent
        color: $text-color
    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color
        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family
    font-size: $font-size-h2

.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
    width: 100%
  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +box-shadow($gray-lighter 0 0 5px 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's pagination @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#pagination
sections.markup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $brand-primary-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's panels @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#panels
sections.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle
  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight
    background-color: $table-bg-header
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2
    padding-top: 4px
    padding-bottom: 4px
    text-align: left

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.table-bordered
  border-left: none
  border-right: none
  > thead > tr
    > th,
    > td
      border-bottom: none

.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)
    background-color: $table-bg-accent

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  margin: 0
  border: none
  background-color: $gray-light


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar
  // Hamburger icon
  .navbar-toggle
    float: left
    margin: 10px 15px
    width: 40px
    height: 40px
    border: 3px $brand-primary solid
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 7px
    .icon-bar
      width: 21px
      height: 4px
      border-radius: 0
      background-color: $brand-primary

  // Navigation
  .navbar-collapse
    border: none
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      padding: 0
  .navbar-nav
    font-weight: $headings-font-weight
    font-size: $font-size-small
    margin-top: 0
    margin-bottom: 0
    & > li
      padding-bottom: 0
      & > a
        color: $brand-primary-light
        text-transform: uppercase

      +breakpoint(tablet)
        & > a
          padding: 17px 20px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.navbar .navbar-nav
  & > li > a:hover
    color: #fff !important

  & > .active > a,
  & > .active > a:focus,
  & > li > a:active,
  & > li > a:focus
    color: #fff
    font-weight: $font-weight-medium
    +breakpoint(tablet)
      border-bottom: 5px #fff solid
      padding-bottom: 12px

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    & > li > a
      background-color: transparent !important

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative
  padding: 20px
  margin-bottom: 30px
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-h4
  overflow: hidden
  & > *
    z-index: 2
    position: relative
  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter
  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base
      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured
  display: table
  width: 100%
  padding-left: 0
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured__item
  display: table-row
  vertical-align: middle
  &:not(:last-child)
    .featured__text,
    .featured__icon
      border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-lighter

.featured__text
  display: table-cell
  padding: 15px 20px

.featured__icon
  display: table-cell
  vertical-align: middle

.featured__circle
  width: 30px
  height: 30px
  float: right
  +circle($brand-primary)
  .icon
    +icon-size(30px)
    color: #fff

sections.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
sections.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%
  display: inline-block
  width: 0.5em
  height: 0
  line-height: 0
  vertical-align: text-bottom
  position: relative
  &:before
    position: absolute
    left: -0.25em
    bottom: 0.33em

sections.description: Icon or any another content to place inside the form input. It works similiar like Bootstrap Input groups, but appears inside the input, not next to it.
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  width: $input-height-base
  height: $input-height-base
  line-height: $input-height-base
  text-align: center

.input-lg + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-large

.input-sm + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-small

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon__wrapper
  position: relative
  color: $brand-primary
  input
    padding-right: 30px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon .icon
  font-size: $font-size-base * 2

sections.css:
$listing-media-width: 160px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  padding-bottom: 30px
  padding-top: 30px
  overflow: hidden
  &:last-child
    padding-bottom: 0
    border-bottom: none

  p
    margin: 0
    text-align: justify


.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  text-align: center


.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden


.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0
  a
    color: $gray-base

  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important



.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small
  color: $gray-light
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  display: block


.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2
  overflow: hidden


.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary
  font-size: $font-size-large
  position: relative
  top: 2px


+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left
    margin-right: 30px
    max-width: $listing-media-width
    overflow: hidden

    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px
      height: 40px
      background-color: $gray-lightest
      text-align: center
      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none
    float: none
    margin-right: 0
    margin-bottom: 20px
    width: 100%
    img
      width: 100%

.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none

.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest


.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none
    padding-bottom: 0


.listing--2-col-layout,
.listing--3-col-layout,
.listing--4-col-layout
  +make-row()
  .listing__item
    border: none
    padding-bottom: 0
  .listing__item-column-main
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
    padding-bottom: 40px
  .listing__item-title
    min-height: 60px
  p
    padding: 0

.listing--2-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(6)

.listing--3-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(4)

.listing--4-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(3)


// Numbered listing

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px
    padding-bottom: 0
    position: relative
    overflow: visible
    border-bottom: none

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed
    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)
      counter-increment: listing--numbered
      position: absolute
      left: -80px
      top: 50%
      width: 80px
      height: 60px
      margin: -30px 0
      text-align: center
      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5

    p:not(:last-child)
      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2


  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3

  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest
    padding: 0 10px 0 35px
    a, button
      color: $brand-primary

.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0
    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px
    margin-bottom: 0
    &:before
      left: -30px
      width: 30px
      height: 20px
      margin: -20px 0
      font-size: $font-size-large
      text-align: left


// Notifications listing
//

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item

  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height

.news-carousel__item-row

  height: $news-carousel-height
  overflow: hidden

  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat

  vertical-align: top
  &, *, a

.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell
  max-height: 400px
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none
  margin-top: 0
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important

.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important
  border: none
  cursor: pointer
  width: 100%
  padding: 0
  display: table
  box-sizing: content-box
  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px

.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell
  height: 70px
  padding: 5px 20px
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: 14px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0

.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  line-height: 40px
  background: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  display: block
  float: left
  text-align: center
  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange
    margin-left: -20px
    padding-left: 20px
  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff
  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff
    background-color: $orange !important

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px
  overflow: hidden


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red
  text-align: center
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding: 3px 0
  width: 120px
  left: 93px
  top: 21px
  position: relative
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  color: #fff
  +rotate(-45)
  +shadow($gray-light, 1px, 1px, 1px)
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''
    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    position: absolute
    bottom: -4px
  &:before
    left: 0
  &:after
    right: 0

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table
  width: 100%

.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667

.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell

.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px
  padding: 0 20px 0 0
  text-align: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px
    text-align: right
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0


.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px

.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  position: relative
  &:before
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 20px
    height: 20px
    position: absolute
    top: 1px
    left: -10px
    background-color: $brand-primary
    border: 6px #fff solid
    border-radius: 50%

.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  margin: 0
  text-transform: uppercase

.timeline__description
  width: 100%
  padding-bottom: 20px
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  margin-bottom: 20px
  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3
    &:last-child
      margin: 0

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none
  .timeline__description
    border: none
    padding: 0


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light

.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  white-space: normal

sections.markup: Switch me
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    +border-radius(15px)
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    +border-radius(50%)
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    letter-spacing: -2px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $brand-success
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  background-color: #0d66a0
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
  overflow: visible

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header__top
  background-color: #fff
  padding-top: 5px
  height: 50px
  #boxes-box-header_top_text
    color: #0065a2
    margin-top: 20px
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-size: 18px
    font-weight: 400

.section--header__bottom
  #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    color: #fff
    font-size: 13px
    font-weight: 400
    margin: 5px 0

.section--header__breadcrumb
    background-color: #074A8B
    padding: 3px 0 2px

.section--header__logo
    display: block
    width: 90px
    height: 62px
    background: url("../images/svg/ec-logo.svg") no-repeat
    margin: 0 10px 0 0
    position: relative
    z-index: 1

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .section--header__top
    height: auto
    #boxes-box-header_top_text
      margin-top: 60px
      font-size: 24px
  .section--header__logo
    width: 172px
    height: 118px
    margin: 10px 35px -35px 0
  .section--header__bottom #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    margin: 5px 0 20px 208px
    font-size: 16px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  .nav-horizontal
    margin: 0 0 -30px
    .nav-horizontal__item
      font-size: 11px
      font-weight: normal
      border-right: 1px #4677a8 solid
      line-height: 1em
      padding: 0 3px 0 0 !important
      margin: 0 !important
      &:last-of-type
        padding: 0
        margin: 0
        border-right: 0

    .nav-horizontal__link
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: #396ea2

.section--header__breadcrumb
  .breadcrumb
    background-color: transparent
    color: #fff
    border-radius: 0
    font-size: 0 // display-inline margins fix
    font-weight: normal
    margin: 0
    padding: 0
  .breadcrumb ol

  .breadcrumb li
    font-size: 11px
    margin: 0

  .breadcrumb li > a
    color: #fff
    &:hover,
    &:focus
      color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > li + li:before
    @extend .glyphicon
    @extend .glyphicon-menu-right:before
    font-size: 8px
    padding: 0 3px 0 1px
    color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > .active
    color: #fff

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +box-shadow($gray-lighter 0 0 5px 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background

section.markup:
• 1

  • 3

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $brand-primary-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px

Panel title #2

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,

    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle

    > td

.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)

      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

section.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
section.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%
  display: inline-block
  width: 0.5em
  height: 0
  line-height: 0
  vertical-align: text-bottom
  position: relative
  &:before
    position: absolute
    left: -0.25em
    bottom: 0.33em

section.description: Icon or any another content to place inside the form input. It works similiar like Bootstrap Input groups, but appears inside the input, not next to it.
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  width: $input-height-base
  height: $input-height-base
  line-height: $input-height-base
  text-align: center

.input-lg + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-large

.input-sm + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-small

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon__wrapper
  position: relative
  color: $brand-primary
  input
    padding-right: 30px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon .icon
  font-size: $font-size-base * 2

section.css:
$listing-media-width: 160px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  padding-bottom: 30px
  padding-top: 30px
  overflow: hidden
  &:last-child
    padding-bottom: 0
    border-bottom: none

  p
    margin: 0
    text-align: justify


.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  text-align: center


.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden


.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0
  a
    color: $gray-base

  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important



.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small
  color: $gray-light
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  display: block


.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2
  overflow: hidden


.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary
  font-size: $font-size-large
  position: relative
  top: 2px


+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left
    margin-right: 30px
    max-width: $listing-media-width
    overflow: hidden

    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px
      height: 40px
      background-color: $gray-lightest
      text-align: center
      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none
    float: none
    margin-right: 0
    margin-bottom: 20px
    width: 100%
    img
      width: 100%

.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none

.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest


.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none
    padding-bottom: 0


.listing--2-col-layout,
.listing--3-col-layout,
.listing--4-col-layout
  +make-row()
  .listing__item
    border: none
    padding-bottom: 0
  .listing__item-column-main
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
    padding-bottom: 40px
  .listing__item-title
    min-height: 60px
  p
    padding: 0

.listing--2-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(6)

.listing--3-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(4)

.listing--4-col-layout
  .listing__item
    +make-md-column(3)


// Numbered listing

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px
    padding-bottom: 0
    position: relative
    overflow: visible
    border-bottom: none

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed
    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)
      counter-increment: listing--numbered
      position: absolute
      left: -80px
      top: 50%
      width: 80px
      height: 60px
      margin: -30px 0
      text-align: center
      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5

    p:not(:last-child)
      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2


  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3

  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest
    padding: 0 10px 0 35px
    a, button
      color: $brand-primary

.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0
    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px
    margin-bottom: 0
    &:before
      left: -30px
      width: 30px
      height: 20px
      margin: -20px 0
      font-size: $font-size-large
      text-align: left


// Notifications listing
//

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel
  +make-row
  +no-gutters
  position: relative

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item
  display: table
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height

.news-carousel__item-row
  display: table-row
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-text
  display: table-cell
  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat
  padding: 30px
  vertical-align: top
  &, *, a
    color: #fff

.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell
  max-height: 400px
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none
  margin-top: 0
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important

.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important
  border: none
  cursor: pointer
  width: 100%
  padding: 0
  display: table
  box-sizing: content-box
  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px

.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell
  height: 70px
  padding: 5px 20px
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: 14px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0

.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  line-height: 40px
  background: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  display: block
  float: left
  text-align: center
  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange
    margin-left: -20px
    padding-left: 20px
  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff
  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff
    background-color: $orange !important

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light

section.description: Live ribbon to display text label on box or image in attractive way
section.markup: Live
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px
  overflow: hidden


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red
  text-align: center
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding: 3px 0
  width: 120px
  left: 93px
  top: 21px
  position: relative
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  color: #fff
  +rotate(-45)
  +shadow($gray-light, 1px, 1px, 1px)
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''
    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    position: absolute
    bottom: -4px
  &:before
    left: 0
  &:after
    right: 0
section.renderMarkup: Live

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table
  width: 100%

.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667

.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell

.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px
  padding: 0 20px 0 0
  text-align: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px
    text-align: right
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0


.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px

.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  position: relative
  &:before
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 20px
    height: 20px
    position: absolute
    top: 1px
    left: -10px
    background-color: $brand-primary
    border: 6px #fff solid
    border-radius: 50%

.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  margin: 0
  text-transform: uppercase

.timeline__description
  width: 100%
  padding-bottom: 20px
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  margin-bottom: 20px
  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3
    &:last-child
      margin: 0

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none
  .timeline__description
    border: none
    padding: 0


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light

.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-medium
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  white-space: normal

// Component

.ribbon

section.description: White stripe for smaller content
section.markup: Switch me
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    +border-radius(15px)
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    +border-radius(50%)
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    letter-spacing: -2px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $brand-success
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px
section.renderMarkup: Switch me

  margin-left: -5px

  box-sizing: content-box

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  background-color: #0d66a0
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
  overflow: visible

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header__top
  background-color: #fff
  padding-top: 5px
  height: 50px
  #boxes-box-header_top_text
    color: #0065a2
    margin-top: 20px
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-size: 18px
    font-weight: 400

.section--header__bottom
  #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    color: #fff
    font-size: 13px
    font-weight: 400
    margin: 5px 0

.section--header__breadcrumb
    background-color: #074A8B
    padding: 3px 0 2px

.section--header__logo
    display: block
    width: 90px
    height: 62px
    background: url("../images/svg/ec-logo.svg") no-repeat
    margin: 0 10px 0 0
    position: relative
    z-index: 1

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .section--header__top
    height: auto
    #boxes-box-header_top_text
      margin-top: 60px
      font-size: 24px
  .section--header__logo
    width: 172px
    height: 118px
    margin: 10px 35px -35px 0
  .section--header__bottom #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    margin: 5px 0 20px 208px
    font-size: 16px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  .nav-horizontal
    margin: 0 0 -30px
    .nav-horizontal__item
      font-size: 11px
      font-weight: normal
      border-right: 1px #4677a8 solid
      line-height: 1em
      padding: 0 3px 0 0 !important
      margin: 0 !important
      &:last-of-type
        padding: 0
        margin: 0
        border-right: 0

    .nav-horizontal__link
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: #396ea2

.section--header__breadcrumb
  .breadcrumb
    background-color: transparent
    color: #fff
    border-radius: 0
    font-size: 0 // display-inline margins fix
    font-weight: normal
    margin: 0
    padding: 0
  .breadcrumb ol

  .breadcrumb li
    font-size: 11px
    margin: 0

  .breadcrumb li > a
    color: #fff
    &:hover,
    &:focus
      color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > li + li:before
    @extend .glyphicon
    @extend .glyphicon-menu-right:before
    font-size: 8px
    padding: 0 3px 0 1px
    color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > .active
    color: #fff
